page.title: 15Ridgeway Hospital,Belper(1)
page.content: {Ridgeway Hospital}is situated just outside{Nether Heage.}It is a hospital for the mentally handicapped. It used to be an isolation hospital for scarlet fever. The staff do not call the people patients,they call them residents. The hospital is all-male and their ages range from 19-80 but most of them are over 60. There are 50 residents and they have visitors anytime. On the left of the drive there is a bungalow in which 4 residents spend most of their time. It consists of a living room which has a TV,settee and fireplace,a dining room and a kitchen where the residents are able to help a little.There are some bedrooms but they are not in use. The men come in every Monday to Friday from 9a.m.to 5p.m. There are 3 wards in the hospital,Cedar,Amber and Belmont, and a Craft Area.
